medicines.description: Adults & Children 12 years and above : 10mL (2 tsp)
Panadol Cough & Cold is a non drowsy formula that provides effective and complete 2 in 1 relief of the symptoms of colds, chills and flu with chesty cough.
Robitussin PS provides symptomatic relief for congested chests and coughs as well as nasal stuffiness due to the common cold
Nin Jiom Pei Pa Koa is a Chinese herbal remedy renowned worldwide to relieve cough, reduce phlegm, soothe sore throat and restore voice loss.
ICM Pharma COFEN 100 is non-drowsy, non-addictive, and orange flavoured syrup used for loosening of phlegm and relief of wet cough.
For temporary relief of common cold with coughs and phlegm and throat irritations.
Liquefies mucus and facilitates expulsion of phlegm.
